derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from diplo- 'double' + Greek dokos 'wooden beam'

means.word_mean: 1. huge quadrupedal herbivore with long neck and tail; of late Jurassic in western North America

auth_sentence.content: His alias, short for Diplodocus, derives from his childhood fascination with dinosaurs.
